name: Embol
description:
Description

Uh… Embol is a game about umm… talking. Yes, it is a game about… talking. Turns out talking is err… much harder than it seems huh? Like uh… really, who would’ve known?

JON is just trying to live a normal life, but he keeps stumbling over his words; can you help him? (bonus points if you feed him chocolate)

Controls

Click to interact
